comments:
I20050222-0821, GTK+ 2.4.14, KDE 3.3.2, X.Org 6.8.0, Linux 2.6.10, SMP
(hyper-threading)

I got this exception when trying to synchronize immediately after start-up.  A
build was automatically triggered on start-up, so the synchronize had to wait
before it could begin.

After applying updates after this synchronization, two projects were deleted:
org.eclipse.core.tests.harness and org.eclipse.core.runtime.
I lost a third project as well, org.eclipse.swt.

This was caused by a patch that was pulled because we couldn't get the license 
change approval. We have since gotten the approval and repatched the code.
